data.actual_result: You doesn't appear on the menu first, then after someone else joined, you'll appear.
data.expected_result: you should appear on the list when you're the only user and when you're two on it.
data.short_description: You doesn't appear on filter by user server logs menu while you're the only user on it
data.steps_to_repro: - Create a server. - Do some logged actions (create role for example). - Look to the server logs: your actions should appear. - Look on the filter by user menu. - After, invite someone on thee server and redo the previous steps.
